archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Refresh Tool
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Developed by vendor in SAP & it is use for code creation & Bom creation in SAP. This tool is having approval mechanism, mail functionality.
Refresh tool is an ad-on created in ECC with Webdynpro development. This tool has all fields from SAP, also here user can assign the attachment.
Matrial types SRVO, IBAU & UNBW: These technical materials (SRVO & UNBW) & assemblies (IBAU) tools materials, are created in ReFresh tool (T Code-/FRESH/WD_MANAGE2B).
Refresh tool is also using IB02 (when there is already a BOM in SAP)
